name: AwoCoupon
author: Seyi Awofadeju

sections.description:
AwoCoupon is a coupon sytem for WooCommerce with enhanced features.  It has an intuitive and simple to use interface and works well alongside WooCommerce coupons.

Major features of AwoCoupon

  • Setup automatic discounts 
  • Create shipping specific coupons
  • Create coupons with optional restrictions on product, category, customer, user group, country, state, payment method
  • Personalize coupon errors
  • Generate multiple coupons
  • Customers can view coupons assigned to them (or their user group) under my account in the front end

Compatibility

  • Tested on WooCommerce 3.0.0 and up
  • For multiingual sites, requires Polylang plugin
  • For user groups, requires Groups plugin

Do you need more functionality with great support? Check out the Premium Version. Major features include:

  • Gift certificates: use a voucher until the value runs out
  • Buy X Get Y Coupons
  • Create combination coupons which allow you to add multiple coupons into one
  • Customer store credit: use balance directly in cart
  • Sell vouchers in your store: customers purchase voucher and automatically receive email with valid code, email fully customizable
  • Add to cart coupon links
  • Send a voucher through email to anyone
  • Reports
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: AwoCoupon is an efficient and powerful coupon system for WooCommerce. It provides more features for discounting and includes automatic discounts.
